reviewText: This is a great show I last watched on ABC weekend special. My kids actually watched and enjoyed it as much as I did. Shows like this are hard to come by now-a-days. I wish they produced more videos from the ABC Weekend Special series.

I work at a primary school and the children have been reading bits from The Ghost of Thomas Kempe. Wanted a copy for the children to watch but found this video really hard to get. Looked forward to it arriving but when I played it, there was a loud hissing noise in the background.
